key.name: app_return_url_desc
key.value: Remember to configure the REDIRECT URIS in your Google application to make it work

key.name: register_app_desc
key.value:
Follow these 2 simple steps to enable Google Connect (recode) on your site:

  • Create your Google application and set a name for it. It should be your social network name so users remember that they signed up.
  • You will be given Client ID and Client secret. Copy them to the form below and you are all set!
After that Google Connect will be ready to use!

key.name: register_success_msg
key.value: Congratulation your configuration is ready to use!

key.name: set_password_mail_template_content_html
key.value:
Dear user «{$username}»
Because you signed up with a Google account, if you need a password, you can use the link below to set your password:
{$resetUrl}

If the link doesn't work, please enter the code manually here {$requestUrl}.
Code: {$code}
If you need a password in the future, you can also use the forget password to recover it.

key.name: set_password_mail_template_content_txt
